faqs.question: Can Non-Resident Indians NRIs invest in a Shop For Sale in South City 1 and what are the regulations
faqs.answer: Yes Non-Resident Indians NRIs and Persons of Indian Origin PIOs are fully permitted to purchase commercial properties including retail shops in India without requiring special prior approval from the RBI except for properties designated as agricultural or plantation land. The payment must strictly be routed through inward remittances or funds held in designated NRE or NRO accounts and all rental income derived is naturally subject to standard Indian tax laws and specified repatriation rules.
